definitions.definition: What ever ; emphasised form of 'what', used to ask which thing, event, circumstance, etc.

examples: Whatever he does, he will still lose the game.

definitions.definition: Anything ; thing(s) of unspecified kind, or no matter what kind; sometimes used to indicate that the speaker does not care about options .
examples: I don't need any of this stuff, so take whatever .

main_definition: ( interrogative ) What ever ; emphasised form of 'what', used to ask which thing, event, circumstance, etc.
secondary_definitions: ( fused relative ) Anything that; all that.
( informal ) Anything ; thing(s) of unspecified kind, or no matter what kind; sometimes used to indicate that the speaker does not care about options .
